Text: Where does the special "the arrival" fit in? In other words, I don't know what order to watch in, the Arrival special first, even though it seems to be set after ep one?

the special arrival thing is a 38 minute long trailer that ruins the entire show for you as far as I can tell.. the weird part is the special looks AMAZING like 1080p where the actual show looks like upscaled 480p

decent quality over all, i love having the whole season in one place, thanks!
